pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microformats2 Utilities=======================Microformats2 provides an extremely flexible way to mark up HTMLdocuments, so that human-centric data is machine-discoverable. Thisutility can be used to interpret a microformatted post or event, fordisplay as a `comment <http://indiewebcamp.com/comments-presentation>`__or `reply-context <http://indiewebcamp.com/reply-context>`__.The library itself has no dependencies, but it won't do you much goodwithout an mf2 parser. I use and recommend`mf2py <https://github.com/tommorris/mf2py>`__.Full `documentation is on GitHub<https://github.com/kylewm/mf2util/blob/master/README.md>`__.Compatibility: Python 2.6, 2.7, 3.3+License: `Simplified BSD <http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-2-Clause>`__
